description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6g1if","text":"This protocol is intended to help you use HOBO data loggers and HOBOware software.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"3grun","text":"HOBO Logger","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tbl6","text":"USB base station/coupler to connect to the computer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c39h5","text":"HOBOware software installed on the computer: HOBO ware is a FREE Download at the following address: https://www.hobodataloggers.com.au/hoboware-free-download\n","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"8kkc4","text":"Connect the HOBO logger to the USB Base Station connected to the computer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eqqbp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7ciic","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"al9q8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9dojd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"biski","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fr78o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2k0sr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"key":"2p1sd","text":"Be careful to insert correctly the HOBO logger.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bo82l","text":"Push it thoroughly in the Base Station: There is a sense (slot) to insert the HOBO Logger.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}}],"guid":"EA338A20E11111E8B07ABD8DA582EE7F","id":679416,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Connection"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"61c9e","text":"4 icons at the top left:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"anp3e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"brj1b","text":" First icon: Launching (Beware the launch of the HoBo probe overwrites the data stored there)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":13,"length":10,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a83d7","text":" Second icon: Reading out (retrieve saved data)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":14,"length":11,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fvaoq","text":" Third icon: Logger status (allows to check the level of charge of the battery and the used memory) ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":13,"length":14,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dd66c","text":" Fourth icon: Stop the device","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":14,"length":4,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"85d6p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"49e9p","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"19u0m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"32145","guid":"3C87EF90E11311E8B07ABD8DA582EE7F","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/9nt3d9e.png","placeholder":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/9nu3d9e.png","original_name":"image.png","mime":"image\/png","width":null,"height":null,"is_video":false,"legend":""}}],"guid":"6866F940E11211E8B07ABD8DA582EE7F","id":679417,"previous_id":679413,"previous_guid":"E304A960E11011E8B07ABD8DA582EE7F","section":"HOBOware Basic functions"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dsq7a","text":"Click the Launching icon on the toolbar (Icon 1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":10,"length":10,"style":"bold"},{"offset":41,"length":6,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1kkq3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4ln69","text":"The Plot Setup window contains the following information:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1ftn8","text":"Description: Indicate the file name","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":11,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"csgst","text":"Parameters: SelectTemperature and Light Intensity","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":10,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5r2ve","text":"Recording interval: \u201c5 seconds\u201d for example (this gives below the possible recording time depending on the memory)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":18,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b7fsk","text":"","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6dj37","text":"To Start recording:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":3,"length":5,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9h3sf","text":"Click on \"Start\" (Immediate) or \"Delayed start\" (Postponed, indicate date \/ time)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"A91CB820E11311E88D661128DA816B2F","id":679418,"previous_id":679417,"previous_guid":"6866F940E11211E8B07ABD8DA582EE7F","section":"HOBO data logger Programing"}
